title: Desirable two bedroom two bath home! Live The Hayden!
posting_body: The Hayden offers expertly managed and meticulously redesigned one and two-bedroom apartment homes on captivating grounds including a rippling creek.
At The Hayden Apartments, you will find Bay Area sophistication without the Bay Area price tag.

We offer beautiful apartments, most having creek or fountain views that feature balconies or patios, stunning granite countertops, wood-style flooring, new carpet and window treatments, deep under-mount sinks, all-new stainless-steel appliances, plenty of cabinets and storage, upgraded recessed lighting, and plumbing fixtures, built-in USB chargers, washer and dryer, and central heat/air.
The gorgeous common areas include a pool, spa, clubhouse, dog park, and on-site laundry facilities.
We are pet-friendly and provide ample parking as well.
*Holding Deposit - Place $100.00 hold that is fully refundable within 72hrs of placing hold.
After the 72hrs is up, it is deposited and will become part of your security deposit upon move in.
*OnSite Screening - Background and credit check for all occupants over 18 years old.

*Verify that 2.5 times the amount of rent is being brought in as income - Proof would include but is not limited to 1 month worth of pay stubs, 2 months’ worth of bank statements, or a new job offer letter.
*Verify 12 months of being a homeowner or leaseholder.
(This is not a requirement but would require an additional security deposit if not verifiable)
Utilities (paid to us with your rent each month)
